name: Combined Chart
description: It is a mixture of all the chart types. The Series would be repersented in form of Line and Column.

name: Radial Dendogram
description: This is a type of Cluster graph. But colloquially it is called a Radial Dendogram.

name: Line Chart
description: It is line chart. But all the datapoints are not shown in one shot. It adds data points in iteration.

name: Hierarchy Chart
description: It is a Sales hierarchy chart with drag and drop feature.

name: Chord Chart
description: This chart helps in analyzing the frequency of rides between various neighborhoods in San Francisco.

name: Force Chart
description: It is a Hierarchy chart with Forced layout.

name: Stacked Chart
description: It is a Stacked vs Grouped chart.

name: Tree Map Chart
description: It is a zoomable Tree map, which depicts World Population.
